document_data.name: Eldest, The
document_data.mainbody: The '''Eldest''' was an [[aboleth]] of massive size, incalculable age and inconceivable malignancy. It ruled the city of [[Xxiphu]] and the [[Abolethic Sovereignty]]. It was the most powerful and oldest aboleth in the city of [[Xxiphu]] and was believed to be the only "living" being that could use the ''[[Key of Stars]]'' to unlock the ''[[Far Manifold]]'' beyond [[Forever's Reach]].<ref>
document_data.History: The Eldest was said to have been old when [[Abeir-Toril]] was split asunder.
